short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Downloads medias from social networks like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter & many more in just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Social Video Downloader is easy and intuitive to use. Just open a video page on Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter, and you'll see the "Download" button on the top-right corner of the page.

The download button is now always visible and offers two options when clicked:

1. Fetch Video Info: Sends a request to our server to fetch the video information for the current page.
2. View Requests: Displays a list of all your past video requests.

Once you've selected a video, it will show the available formats. Just choose the desired format, and the download will begin. 

Promoting Extensions: This extension fetches and displays a list of our other available extensions directly in its popup for your convenience.

If you encounter any issues downloading media, please leave a comment or send an email to "tikamchand06@gmail.com" with the video details.

Donâ€™t forget to give us five stars if you enjoy using this downloader!

Note: We do not support downloading videos from YouTube.

For more video downloading options, visit our website: "https://socialdownloader.in".
